name: Hotel La Giara

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved Cefalu - who doesn't? The hotel was clean and the staff friendly and helpful. Being accustomed to Paris hotels, the rooms were more than adequate for the two of us. We were a couple of blocks from the warmest, cleanest water I've ever paddled about in and the Piazza was as pretty as it gets. We attended a party on the rooftop of the hotel. It was magical! Amazing views and cool, sea breezes made it a night to remember. We will return for a longer stay than the all too short 2 nights.
reviews.title: Great Location, Rooftop splendor, and Cheerful
So-So hotel
reviews.text: Room: though clean but not spacious which was a bit uncomfortable- air conditioning did not work. Beds were comfy with clean and crisp linens but décor seriously needs a renovation. Complimentary wi-fi with average speed and refrigerator in room.

description: In the historical centre of Cefalù, a few metres from the beach, offers all facilities for an unforgettable holiday.Hotel rooms are equipped with private bath, hair-dryer, television, frigo, telephone, heating, air conditioning. Hotel composed of 24 rooms, is equipped with a lift and accessible to the disabled.Both small and well-mannered pets are welcome.From the hotel terrace you can enjoy an enchanting view. Here you can sunbathe in a relaxing atmosphere.
